person.persName: Gotfrey M. Isaacs (Jackson County, KY, farmer and soldier)

body.p: Jackson County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Lydia Isaacs. Father of Maria Isaacs, Hezakiah Isaacs, Francis M. Isaacs, and William T. Isaacs. Employed Elizabeth Morris and John J. Morris as domestic servants in 1860. Farmer in Jackson County in 1860. Served in the 7th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry (U.S.A.) as second lieutenant from September 22, 1861 to March 22, 1862. Served in the 14th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry (U.S.A.) as a private from August 21, 1862 to September 16, 1863.
